name: Medieval Battle Simulator
description:
Playing "Medieval Battle Simulator" you will face different war situations set in medieval times. Both environments and troops (own and enemy) help the medieval setting.
In each level you play, you will find that the battlefield is separated into two equal parts by a white line in the middle. Each part matches to one of the factions, you will always be of the red faction, and your enemies will be of the blue faction.
You will see that the troops of the enemy are already positioned and ready to fight, waiting for your army for battle.
You will have a series of points available to spend in your army, keep in mind that each troop you place will subtract from those points. You will have to spend all your points but in a balanced way.
Each level that advances in the campaign levels will be more complicated, putting you in numerical inferiority, increasing the size of the battlefield or forming very strong and difficult to defeat armies.


What to expect:

-15 different levels with increasing difficulty

-Good retro graphics, matching perfect with the gameplay

-Easy to understand gameplay

How to play:

-You just need your mouse to move trought the menu and to play.
